00029 #import "GHNSDate+Utils.h"
00030 #import "GHNSString+TimeInterval.h"
00031 
00032 // Common date formats
00033 NSString *const kDateFormatShortMonthFullYearTime = @"LLL d, yyyy hh:mm a";
00034 
00035 @implementation NSDate (GHUtils)
00036 
00037 NSUInteger const kUnitFlags = NSYearCalendarUnit | NSMonthCalendarUnit |  NSDayCalendarUnit | NSWeekdayCalendarUnit;
00038 
00039 + (NSDate *)_gh_normalizedDate:(NSDate *)date adjustDay:(NSInteger)adjustDay {
00040   NSCalendar *calendar = [NSCalendar currentCalendar];
00041   NSDateComponents *comps = [calendar components:kUnitFlags fromDate:date];
00042   [comps setHour:0];
00043   [comps setMinute:0];
00044   [comps setSecond:0];
00045   if (adjustDay != 0) [comps setDay:[comps day] + adjustDay];
00046   return [calendar dateFromComponents:comps]; 
00047 }
00048 
00049 - (NSDate *)gh_addDays:(NSInteger)days {
00050   NSCalendar *calendar = [NSCalendar currentCalendar];
00051   NSDateComponents *comps = [calendar components:kUnitFlags fromDate:self];
00052   if (days != 0) [comps setDay:[comps day] + days];
00053   return [calendar dateFromComponents:comps];   
00054 }
00055 
00056 - (NSDate *)gh_beginningOfDay {
00057   return [NSDate _gh_normalizedDate:self adjustDay:0];
00058 }
00059 
00060 + (NSDate *)gh_yesterday {  
00061   return [NSDate _gh_normalizedDate:[NSDate date] adjustDay:-1];
00062 }
00063 
00064 + (NSDate *)gh_tomorrow { 
00065   return [NSDate _gh_normalizedDate:[NSDate date] adjustDay:1];
00066 }
00067 
00068 - (BOOL)gh_isTomorrow {
00069   return ([[self gh_beginningOfDay] compare:[NSDate gh_tomorrow]] == NSOrderedSame);
00070 }
00071 
00072 - (BOOL)gh_isToday {
00073   return ([[self gh_beginningOfDay] compare:[[NSDate date] gh_beginningOfDay]] == NSOrderedSame);
00074 }
00075 
00076 - (BOOL)gh_wasYesterday {
00077   return ([[self gh_beginningOfDay] compare:[NSDate gh_yesterday]] == NSOrderedSame);
00078 }
00079 
00080 - (NSString *)gh_weekday:(NSDateFormatter *)formatter {
00081   if ([self gh_isTomorrow]) return @"Tomorrow";
00082   else if ([self gh_isToday]) return @"Today";
00083   else if ([self gh_wasYesterday]) return @"Yesterday";
00084   
00085   if (!formatter) return nil;
00086   
00087   NSInteger weekday = [[[NSCalendar currentCalendar] components:kUnitFlags fromDate:self] weekday] - 1;
00088   return [[formatter weekdaySymbols] objectAtIndex:weekday];
00089 }
00090 
00091 - (NSString *)gh_format:(NSString *)format useWeekday:(BOOL)useWeekday {
00092   NSDateFormatter *dateFormatter = [[NSDateFormatter alloc] init];
00093   [dateFormatter setDateFormat:format]; 
00094   NSString *formatted = [dateFormatter stringFromDate:self];
00095   if (useWeekday) {
00096     NSString *specialWeekday = [self gh_weekday:dateFormatter]; 
00097    formatted = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@, %@", specialWeekday, formatted];
00098   }
00099   [dateFormatter release];
00100   return formatted;
00101 }
00102 
00103 - (NSString *)gh_timeAgo:(BOOL)includeSeconds { 
00104   return [NSString gh_stringForTimeInterval:[self timeIntervalSinceNow] includeSeconds:includeSeconds];
00105 }
00106 
00107 @end
